overview: Since it was established in 1993 Netcomm’s has used a combination of skill, experience, innovation, and exceptional customer service to deliver great value, quality communications solutions to 1,000’s of UK businesses. We have a range of Netcomm’s products and services that include fixed lines, calls,inbound 08 numbers, mobile and PDA, BlackBerry, and business class broadband. Many businesses continue to pay significantly over the odds for their outbound telephone calls dueb to the cost of communications being overlooked, hidden or often accepted as an unfortunate but necessary overhead. for more visit us at http://www.telecomsinabox.com/
